title: Back to Back Stemplots: Bad Trivia Skills
question_text:
Walter and Jesse are on a two person trivia team. Jesse thinks that he does not really need his partner, so he kept track of how many points each person scored in each contest.
Stem
Jesse (1) (10) Walter (1)
8653 1 -
641 2 -
7851 3 -
8876441 4 69
8753 5 1456779
841 6 11113345778999
642 7 1134568
971 8 01
51 9 -
Key: 1|3 = 13.
Which of the following statements is TRUE based on the data?

choices.text: Jesse has a higher median and Walter has a higher range.
Jesse has a higher mean and Walter has a higher range.
Jesse has a lower median and Walter has a higher variance.
Jesse has a lower median and Walter has a lower range.
Jesse has a higher range and Walter has a lower mean.
